Gets an updated transaction by ID

Gets the most recent transactions for a user. Response will include an array of transactions that are still in progress, or that were just updated to COMPLETED during the course of this request. The array will be empty if no transactions are pending or updated. Only the most recent transaction for each profile field will be included so there may be up to 3 (Address, Email, Telephone).

get.description: Returns a list of search results, from Search.gov, for the passed search query

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for the page of results that is being requested

query.description: The term used to generate these search results

spelling_correction.description: Spelling correction for your search term.

text_best_bets.description: Text best bets, which appear only when the query matches the text of the best bet’s title, description, or keywords.

graphic_best_bets.description: Graphic best bets, which appear only when the query matches the text of the best bet’s title, description, or keywords.

links.description: An array of links in the graphic best bet. Each link contains a title and a URL

related_topics.description: An array of topics related to the health topic. Each topic contains a title and a URL

related_sites.description: An array of sites related to the the health topic. Each site contains a title and a URL

minimum.description: Minimum salary of the job opening

maximum.description: Maximum salary of the job opening

locations.description: An array of locations of the job opening

screen_name.description: Screen name of the tweet author

agency_names.description: An array of agency names of the federal register document

related_search_terms.description: An array of related search terms, which are based on recent, common searches on the your site.
